column4: hi, i got lil question: How to change icons in 11.10? I know how to do it in 11.04 but now i have lost my icons and i don't know how to change icons theme :/
it's not in the same place where i can change wallaper as it was in 11.04
I don't think you can just go and change the icons in 11.10
Ubuntu 11.10 is using GNome 3.2 that's why, Unity by default, Gnome Shell in repos, and a fall back mode
I assume you changed the icons the Gnome 2 way and such, but with Gnome 3 things are diffenret
as for the background changeer program persoanlly from what I seen I prefer the old Gnome 2 one :)
so there's some program or something that can let me change the icons?
well maybe in there soem wehre
okay, so i'll look for something like this or i will just start using standard icon set
well that gnome tweak tool might work with Unity as well for exmaple, plus  Gnome has it's config settings like wehre your changing your background, look aorund probaby something for icons
or maybe not, since Gnome 3 themes are done diffenrelty as well hmm for Shell, hmm, ah well worth a look around anyway
